spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The thought spy's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}). The thought spy can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the thought spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.
